thread.title: William Holland
thread.title_full: Driver Support reviewed by William Holland

author: William Holland
title: William Holland
text: System working ok until Driver Support popped up during the loading of a new printer. 20 drivers reported out-dated. After trying to clear the program and return to the printer setup without success, I paid the $9.95 to install it. I then worked through the reported 20 out dated drivers - about 90 minutes and restarted the machine. After Windows finally appearred, the mouse (Logitech Wireless) was inoperative. Attempts to find it were unsuccessful and while rerunning Driver Support did not detect either mouse or Logitech. "Unknown devise" was shown but Windows would not accept it (Error 43). Never again to bite on these "make the machine run faster better up to date"!
